turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there! How're you this morning? Listen, I've decided I definitely need a great cup of coffee to get my day started!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I'm fine thanks! Which location would you prefer to order from today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking a Coffee from the local Starbucks inside the Kroger Marketplace location is just what I need!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I can place an order online for you right away!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'd be great! I need a strong coffee with lots of flavor and caffeine!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to order your usual coffee drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I think I'd like to try one of their new seasonal Coffee options this time!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh! According to the website they are currently offering, Caramel Brulee Latte's and black and white mocha!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow! Both of those sound great, but I think I'd really like to try the Caramel Brulee Latte!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay then, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti of course! The bigger and stronger, the better!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk do you want and would you like any extra flavoring or whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like whole milk and definitely lots of whip on top, with an extra shot of espresso if possible, please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about sugar or honey? Would you like either of those in your drink or on the side?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks! Just the Venti, Caramel Brulee Latte' with whole milk and lots of whip on top with an extra shot of espresso!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got it! Your credit card is already on file at that location, so I'll go ahead and place the order for you!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Can't wait to try it! Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order at the Starbucks location you requested, it will be ready shortly! You can expect to receive a text message on your phone with your receipt soon!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again! I really appreciate it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! You are welcome! Anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it! Thanks again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure! Enjoy your coffee!
